name: readium-js

scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:submodule && npm run prepare:dependencies
scripts.prepare:submodule: cd readium-shared-js && npm run prepare && cd .. && ls
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts
scripts.preversioning: node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js build-output/_multiple-bundles && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js build-output/_single-bundle && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js build-output/XXX
scripts.versioning: node build-config/versioning.js build-output/version.json && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/cpy/cli.js build-output/version.json build-output/XXX/
scripts.build:scripts: npm run versioning && npm run build:scripts:multiple && npm run build:scripts:single
scripts.postbuild:scripts: node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/XXX && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/version.json && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/cpy/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/cpy/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/cpy/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/cpy/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/cpy/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/cpy/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.map && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.map && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.map
scripts.http:watch: echo > open_webbrowser.js && parallelshell "npm run dowatch" "npm run httpServe"
scripts.http: npm run genPluginsConfig && parallelshell "npm run httpServe" "npm run webBrowser"
scripts.dowatch: node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/watch/cli.js "npm run build && node readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/readium-build-tools/webbrowser.js && npm run webBrowser && node ./readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js open_webbrowser.js" dev/ js/ readium-shared-js/js/ readium-shared-js/plugins/ readium-shared-js/readium-cfi-js/js/
